newsitem.title: USA: BMC unaware of reason for trading activity.
newsitem.headline: BMC unaware of reason for trading activity.

text.p: BMC Software Inc was uncertain Wednesday what was fueling increased interest in its shares, which were up sharply on strong institutional buying in morning trading, said John Cox, head of investor relations.
"I'm not aware of anything. We have not made any announcements," he said to comment on a run-up in the company's stock price.
Analysts have not posted ratings changes or revised earnings estimates on the company in the past week, he said, and the company has not met with analysts recently.
BMC Software stock was up 5 at 84-3/4 in midday Nasdaq trading on volume of 1.5 million shares, about twice normal daily volume.
